name: Bettergun_AK47(WIP)
description:
(Still WIP, Do not recommend using this now unless you want to test it)

Trained with animefull.

※ 0.85 ~ 1 Recommended

※ Trigger Words: AK-47, AKM, kalashnikov_rifle, assault_rifle, holding_gun

※ Recommended Negatives: sling, bullpup, foregrip, bad_gun_anatomy, m4_carbine, reloading, handgun

You can combine other prompts such as:

※ pose prompts: aiming | aiming_at_viewer

※ view prompts: profile | from_side | from_behind

※ grip prompts: trigger_discipline | finger_on_trigger(choose one)

Due to the lack of training images, I used AK-47 and AKM both for the training. With T2I, this requires a lot of gacha so recommend using this with controlnet extensions.

Pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/users/24425816

HuggingFace: https://huggingface.co/FlyHigh1/Bettergun

meta.prompt: masterpiece, best quality, high resolution, <lora:ak47_7:0.95>, 1girl, solo, black_hair, blue_eyes, jacket, holding gun, ak-47, akm, assault rifle, kalashnikov rifle, trigger_discipline, low-ready
